text: Platyptilia grisea is a moth of the family Pterophoridae. It is known from Madagascar. This species has a wingspan of 18mm.Gibeaux, 1994. Faune de Madagascar 81- Pterophoridae. P.26 ==References== grisea Category:Endemic fauna of Madagascar Category:Moths of Madagascar Category:Moths described in 1994
title: Platyptilia grisea
